Through mentorship, shared values, and a sense of purpose, I would guide them toward a deeper commitment to the cause.

Ultimately, the strength of our alliances lies in unity of purpose. We must act as a coordinated force, not as isolated individuals. Every action we take, whether public or covert, must be in service of protecting our people and ensuring our future. We are the last line of defense against the annihilation of our race and culture.
